summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Timeline tab functionality in Project Details page. Found critical frontend component errors preventing all three key features from working: auto-scheduling, double-click task editing, and add task functionality.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 404 'No tasks found for project' even when tasks exist
Component crashes with 'onTaskDoubleClick is not defined' error
critical_bugs.impact: Entire timeline component fails to render, blocking all timeline functionality

critical_bugs.issue: Timeline tab content not rendering - shows blank page
critical_bugs.impact: Users cannot access any timeline features

missing_functionality.issue: Button not found on timeline page
missing_functionality.impact: Users cannot create new tasks from timeline view

missing_functionality.issue: Button not found on timeline page
No task elements rendered for interaction
missing_functionality.impact: Users cannot edit tasks by double-clicking

api_integration_issues.issue: API calls returning HTML instead of JSON
api_integration_issues.symptoms: SyntaxError: Unexpected token '<' in JSON parsing

critical_fixes_required: Fix EnhancedDragDropGantt component - add missing onTaskDoubleClick prop/handler
Fix Timeline tab rendering - component is completely broken and shows blank page
Fix auto-scheduling API endpoint - not finding tasks that exist in database
Add missing Add Task button to timeline interface
Add missing Auto Schedule button to timeline interface
action_item_for_main_agent.priority: CRITICAL - Timeline functionality is completely non-functional
action_item_for_main_agent.impact: Users cannot use any of the three requested timeline features
